PersonAffinity.name: PersonAffinity
PersonAffinity.description: Represents the affinity of a person.

AffinityType.description: Specifies the type of the person affinity.

ArchivedDate.description: The date on which the person affinity was archived.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the person affinity.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the person affinity.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency related to the person affinity.

Description.description: The description of the person affinity.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the person affinity is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the person affinity.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

Source.description: Specifies the information source of the person affinity.

StartDate.description: Specifies the start date of the person affinity.

SubCategory.description: Specifies the sub category of the person affinity.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type for the person affinity.
